strings:
<voice_0x01000D9D><se_low>King Trode: ...Well, I never!
What have we here!?

<voice_0x01000D9E><se_low>King Trode: Yes... This must be it!
The ancient ship we heard about in Pickham!

<voice_0x01000D9F><se_low>King Trode: Now we can pick up Dhoulmagus's hateful
trail again!

<voice_0x01000DA0><se_low>King Trode: But...it's enormous.
How on earth will we get it down to the sea!?
I must admit, I'm rather stumped.
<voice_0x01000DA1><se_low>King Trode: If only it wasn't quite so far inland...
<voice_0x01000DA2><se_low>King Trode: I know! Show me the map!
<voice_0x01000DA3><se_low>King Trode: Now let's see. Here's my castle.

<voice_0x01000DA4><se_low>King Trode: Which means now we must be...
Hm. Here!?

<voice_0x01000DA6><se_low>King Trode: We're directly south of the castle!
I had no idea we were so close to home.
<voice_0x01000DA7><se_low>King Trode: Hm... In that case, we should go back to the castle and see if we can find mention of this ship in the library. We might just find a clue!

<voice_0x01000DA8><se_low>King Trode: There's no time to lose!
We must return to Trodain!
To the castle!
